Name: active_projects_only
Description: Select only projects with an active status

Name: team_within_size_limit
Description: Ensure team size respects organizational limits

Name: workers_available_only
Description: Assign only workers who are available

Name: exclude_resolved_blockers
Description: Exclude blockers that are already resolved

Name: prefer_certified_skills
Description: Prefer workers with certified skills for tasks

Name: high_priority_features_required
Description: Include only features meeting priority threshold

Name: user_stories_ready_only
Description: Plan only user stories in a ready status

Name: active_sprint_backlog_only
Description: Use sprint backlogs that are currently active

Name: exclude_chore_tasks
Description: Do not include tasks of type chore

Name: sprint_goal_must_exist
Description: Only consider sprints with a defined objective

Name: release_plan_planned_only
Description: Work only from planned release plans
